full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/18/2023 UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Immigration and Naturalization Service 300 North Los Angeles Street Los Angeles, California 90012 FILE # A-17 182 973 DATE: 11-18-68 TO: BUSINESS OFFICE, LABORATORY AND RADIOLOGY DEPARTMENT OF HOSPITAL FROM ATTACHED LIST SUBJECT: PERFORMANCE OF X-RAY AND SEROLOGICAL STUDIES The bearer of this letter Mr. Yoh Han Lee File # A-17 182 973 , whose photograph is hereto attached, is an applicant for permanent residence. As part of his examina- tion he must present to the United States Public Health Service the following laboratory reports; 1. Report of a 14" X 17" chest x-ray, PA projection only. 2. Report of a screening serological test for syphilis. The above reports are to be returned to: U. S. PUBLIC HEALTH SERVICE OUTPATIENT CLINIC ATTN: MEDICAL OFFICER IN CHARGE 825 South Beacon Street San Pedro, California 90731 The original of this letter, bearing the alien's photograph, should be forwarded to the U.S. Public Health Service with the above reports for identification purposes. The duplicate may be retained for your records if desired. ALL EXPENSES FOR THE ABOVE PROCEDURES MUST BE BORNE BY THE ALIEN AT THE TIME THE ABOVE STUDIES ARE PERFORMED Sharp E. J. Strapp Assistant District Director Travel Control
